ValidationRule.description: Prevent Changing status to Awarded for 3 minutes after creation
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Permission.ServiceNowContractUpsertTesting), ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(StageName, '5 - Awarded'), ISPICKVAL(New_or_Renewal__c, 'New'), (TIMENOW() - TIMEVALUE(CreatedDate)) / 60000 < 3 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Opportunity is pending creation in ServiceNow. Please wait some minutes and then change to “Awarded”.
